price: But those who strive against Our verses[3], seeking to discredit them, for such there will be a punishment of agonizing pain.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: [3] In order to undermine their credibility.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
